EMERGENCY TEACHING CERTIFICATES
An emergency permit to perform the duties of a regular classroom teacher in the
elementary, junior high school or high school, will be issued to the school em¬
ploying participants in the Teacher Education by Television program under the fol¬
lowing conditions;
Participants Employed
Upon receipt of an application and fee of $L 00 accompanied by the certification of
the employing superintendent that the applicant is enrolled in a cooperating college
or university for the instruction in Teacher Education by Television, an emergency
teaching permit will be issued to the applicant valid for the scholastic year in which
the permit is issued.
All Participants
Upon certification by a cooperating college or university that the participant has suc¬
cessfully completed the teacher education instruction by television, the participant
may be granted upon application and payment of fee of $1 0 00 a permit to teach valid
for one year which may be renewed if necessary upon subsequent re-applications for
each of the two succeeding years.
